item.title: Dumped vehicle. Untaxed and no MOT, 19th October
item.description:
Again another vehicle dumped in the carpark. Red Citeron with flat front tyres and filled will furniture. Please note we know where these vehicles originate from and once reported they do tend to remove the licence plates. A dumped White Citeron is parked in private property of Austen Appartments and belong originiates from the same people. But cannot be removed due to being on private land apparently. Vehicles just get clamped and takes ages to be removed and then the same thing happens again. Please take action against the originators.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Wadhurst Close, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cigarette butt thrown out of the window, 19th October
item.description:
A Mercedes waited for about 5 mins inside the car (where parking making a second line is prohibited) and smoked a cigarette. Before driving away, they threw their cigarette butt out of the window. Photos attached

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Cosway Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Foxes keep pulling bins bags out and littering the street, 19th October
item.description:
The black bin by the bus stop is regularly overfilled including domestic waste (black) bin bags with food left overs. Because the bin has no cover, foxes climb in overnight, pull the bags out, tear them open, and litter & food waste is strewn all over the road (and in our garden). I'd be grateful if you can arrange for a new bin with a cover on it to prevent it being used for domestic waste and to prevent foxes climbing in. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenwich South Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet
